author: MATTHEW DUNN
title: iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s Plus specs, price, release date: World reacts | iPad Pro | Pencil | DailyTelegraph
text:
EARLIER this morning, Apple held its biggest day of product announcements this year in which it unveiled two new iPhones, a bigger iPad and an updated Apple TV.
As expected, Twitter was thrown into overdrive with punters jumping on the opportunity to comment on Apple‚Äôs announcements.
The biggest news of the day was Apple‚Äôs iPhone 6s and 6s Plus and people seemed excited about everything but the cost.

‚Äî WednesJay (@ViewsFromJay) September 10, 2015 iPhone 6s? pic.twitter.com/r3K4NFYMBf
‚Äî anna (@nutellaANDpizza) September 9, 2015 "iPhone 6s" pic.twitter.com/daOOW6zcWN
‚Äî loving johanna (@MCCANNAIR) September 9, 2015 As part of the launch, Apple showcased their largest tablet to date with the iPad Pro and people couldn‚Äôt resit making fun of its size.
This guy's got his new #iPadPro already! #AppleEvent pic.twitter.com/AvSc3wRe6g
‚Äî Peter (@Pietros1) September 9, 2015 Whoa. It's huge. pic.twitter.com/LoehWE4oDk
‚Äî Neven Mrgan (@mrgan) September 9, 2015 the ipad pro already has one happy customer pic.twitter.com/tdXQLGPGpB
‚Äî Darren Orf (@darrenthewalrus) September 9, 2015 Apple‚Äôs new Pencil was also a talking point, but maybe not in the way the company had hoped.
Can't WAIT to get one of these! #AppleEvent pic.twitter.com/nmpQgs6Qsg
‚Äî James Martin (@Pundamentalism) September 9, 2015 Hate to brag, but i am the first person to get my hands on the new #Apple #Pencil pic.twitter.com/LfaekHlfWh
‚Äî Daddy (@LifeisSavage) September 9, 2015 ‚úèüçé $100 for a pencil? That's pretty intense. What do you guys think? #appleevent #ipencil ¬ª http://t.co/IKxdxUB1c5 pic.twitter.com/KdkLmFqOS4
‚Äî Redbubble (@redbubble) September 9, 2015 Unfortunately, some people were left upset because products they wanted were not announced.
The product we all want to be announced at the Apple Event.. pic.twitter.com/yyLALcU4Sj
‚Äî Professor Snape (@_Snape_) September 9, 2015 apple dropping the air jobs III today? pic.twitter.com/7qTXu5cOZ9
‚Äî Four Pins (@Four_Pins) September 9, 2015 And then there were the people who missed the mark completely.
Latest apple news: I'm eating one in my backyard surrounded by cats. Don't worry I'll keep you up to date pic.twitter.com/5QaePGPf29
‚Äî Laura Hudson (@laura_hudson) September 9, 2015 Some of you have been asking about the apple specs. It is 1) round 2) red and green 3) this size next to a cat pic.twitter.com/eP8vPgOKap
‚Äî Laura Hudson (@laura_hudson) September 9, 2015 Originally published as The world reacts to the Apple launch
